snippet: The University of Virginia fraternity at the center of a debunked Rolling Stone article about a gang rape filed a $25 million lawsuit against the magazine.
abstract: University of Virginia fraternity that was focus of debunked Rolling Stone article about gang rape files $25 million lawsuit against magazine; article's author Sabrina Rubin Erdely is also named as defendant.
lead_paragraph: The University of Virginia fraternity at the center of a debunked Rolling Stone article about a gang rape filed a $25 million lawsuit against the magazine.

headline.main: Fraternity Files $25 Million Suit Against Rolling Stone
headline.print_headline: Fraternity Files $25 Million Suit Against Rolling Stone
